page.title: 08District and Parish Councils
page.content: (continued from page 7) For district council election purposes, most of block 03440240 is in S. Herefordshire District, but differ- ent wards will have elections in different years. Thus Swainshill ward, which includes the parish of Stretton Sugwas, will have elections in 1986, 1990, etc, while for Gorsty ward, which includes the parish of Eaton Bishop, elections will be in 1988, 1992 etc. For parish councils, all councillors retire in the year of a district council election in that parish. The block comprises Stretton Sugwas parish, parts of Breinton, Eaton Bishop and Kenchester parishes, and part of Hereford City. Eaton Bishop will have elections in 1988, 1992 etc and the other parishes in 1986, 1990 etc.
